typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		movie as string,
		title as string,
		genres as string,
		year as string,
		Rating as string,
		{Rotton Tomato} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> ADLSG2ds
ADLSG2ds select(mapColumn(
		movie,
		title,
		genres,
		year,
		{Rotten Tomato} = {Rotton Tomato}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> CorrectColumnName
CorrectColumnName filter(toInteger(year) > 1950) ~> FilterMoviesUnder1951
FilterMoviesUnder1951 derive(PrimaryGenre = iif(locate("|",genres) > 1, left(genres, locate("|",genres)-1),genres)) ~> PrimaryGenre
PrimaryGenre window(over(PrimaryGenre,
		year),
	desc({Rotten Tomato}, true),
	RatignsRank = rank()) ~> RankByRatings
RankByRatings aggregate(groupBy(PrimaryGenre,
		year),
	AverageRating = avg(toInteger({Rotten Tomato})),
		HighestRated = first(title),
		LowestRated = last(title),
		NumberOfMovies = count()) ~> AggregateRatings
AggregateRatings alterRow() ~> AlterRow1
AlterRow1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:true,
	keys:['PrimaryGenre','year'],
	format: 'table',
	staged: true,
	allowCopyCommand: true,
	mapColumn(
		PrimaryGenre,
		year,
		AverageRating,
		HighestRated,
		LowestRated,
		NumberOfMovies
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> sink1
